column4: Need help with Samba. My Vista Box can see my Ubuntu box, but Samba won't authenticate the login. I am using username "HappyTrees/elexodus" as my username (Server/Uname), and of course the password I set up using 'smbpasswd'. Any ideas?
I find it is sometimes helpful to match the logins.
Match the Windows username/password to the Ubuntu username/password. That's what I have to do sometimes.
